description: Installation of rooflight to rear roofslope (in association with conversion of roofspace into a habitable room)
decision_conditions: The proposed development would meet the criteria of Class C of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended) and would be lawful.

Any soakaway for clean roof drainage should be through sealed trap gullies and only sited in areas of clean naturally occurring materials in accordance with building regulations Approved Doc H.Any unexpected contamination encountered should be reported to the EHO in accordance with Building regulations approved Doc C

As the proposed development is within flood zones 2 and 3 or on a site of more than 1ha, you are required to complete a Flood Risk Form before the application can be assessed.  For further information and guidance on any aspects of undertaking a Flood Risk Assessment please contact the Environment Agency by visiting their website at http://planningguidance.communities.gov.uk/blog/guidance/flood-risk-and-coastal-change/site-specific-flood-risk-assessment-checklist/
